body.p: The bearir of this a Colored woman, Sallie white is sister to Hez. Alexander Junr who is in the penitentiary of the State. we also send you a statement of the facts and evidence in the case, which I think you will see was testimony of a verry slight character to convict upon, the mother and sisters of the boy for honesty are I believe under a verry good character they pledge themselves to reform the boy and take him under their own care -- I think in view of all the facts it is a case that demands your clemency -- hoping you are well and that the Legislature will will come up to your suggestions in Your Message like men

I am Yours
Jesse S. Taylor
